name: NECROCAT 9000
description:
Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44

Theme = Your life is currency

Controls: Dash: Spacebar Walk: Arrows Keys or W,A,S & D Summons = 1,2,3,4 & 5 Keys Story Progression: Right Arrow Key Gameplay: Survive as long as possible by summoning undead robot minions to vanquish evil doggos Gain life by dashing thru corpses, helping you survive longer Doggos spawn rate increases over time leading to your inevitable demise Score = Life Spent Summoning Summon Functionality: Lightning: stun targets Vet: seeks and destroys fast Mailman: seeks and destroys slow Vacuum: moves fast and destroys Decoy: bomb
